SEGMENT_2_SLIDES.title: Finding the Right Apprenticeship
SEGMENT_2_SLIDES.subtitle: Your First Step Into Professional Tattooing
keyPoints: Research shops in your area (3-6 month process)
Look for licensed, experienced mentors (10+ years)
Expect 1-3 year commitment (unpaid or low pay)
Portfolio required: 50+ drawings in tattoo style

keyPoints: Year 1: Cleaning, observing, practicing on fake skin
Year 2: Assisting, tattooing friends/family, building portfolio
